asap.realizer.pegboard

Class BeforePeg

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.pegboard.TimePeg
      • asap.realizer.pegboard.BeforePeg

  • public class BeforePeg
extends TimePeg
    BeforePegs define TimePegs that remains at a minimum time offset before a 'regular' TimePeg.
    that is: beforePeg.getGlobalTime() <= linkedPeg.getGlobalTime()+offset if the link's value is TimePeg.VALUE_UNKNOWN, it is ignored.
    Author:
    welberge
